        public MessagingClient.Builder userId​(java.lang.String userId)
        Mandatory. Specify the user id for the account.

        public MessagingClient.Builder secret​(java.lang.String secret)

      • config

        public MessagingClient.Builder config​(org.asynchttpclient.AsyncHttpClientConfig config)
        Optional. Allows specifying a AsyncHttpClientConfig with custom settings. The passed configuration will be cloned and the necessary configuration for the Messaging client will be added.

      • baseUrl

        public MessagingClient.Builder baseUrl​(java.lang.String baseUrl)
        Optional. Specify the base url to send messages to.

      • mediaUrl

        public MessagingClient.Builder mediaUrl​(java.lang.String mediaUrl)
        Optional. Specify the trusted media server. Note that credentials specified in client will be sent to this server.
